name: Off Road Cargo Heavy Trailer Truck Simulator 3D
name_original: Off Road Cargo Heavy Trailer Truck Simulator 3D
description:
Get ready for the real and breathtaking offroad driving experience. Drive off-road cargo truck and trailer to explore the beautiful hilly environment and test your off-road driving skills with truck and trailer. Driving on hills, mountains and steep paths is a real driving challenge in off-road cargo truck and trailer driver simulator. You have to deliver Army Truck, Bickers, wooden boxes, racing cars, trucks, weapons, army cargo, barrels, oil tankers and other material from one point to another point through hilly areas and mountains which is challenging from you. Every heavy machine is design from carrying specific items. In this off-road game for the first time you can transport a transporting truck. Before this no game has allowed this facility to its users.
In this off-road driving game you have to transport things from one place to another. You have to go from different level of the game to complete your full level. Every level is different from each other.
Every level of the game is based on different tracks and maps. Every track has its own different and difficult and challenging levels for everyone. On completion of every level you will be provide with some bonus.
Off Road Cargo Truck and Trailer Driving Simulator Game Features:
• Real Experience of off road Cargo Truck and trailer Driving.
• Exciting Game with different missions.
• Smooth Steering, Brakes and Lifting.
• Amazing 3D Graphics and off-road Environment.
• Heavy machine transportation facilities.
• Manual & Automatic gears
• Interior Camera
• Thrill and dangerous of Driving on Hilly areas, Mountains. And much more.
Have a good drive!
